name: One In The Chamber (WillC_Squared)
description:
PLAY IN FULLSCREEN

This game was made for the GMTK 2019 Game Jam. It was inspired by the old Minecraft mini-game "One in the chamber" where you only have one shot, and recieve one ammo on kill. If you miss, you are screwed. So, I implemented that design idea into a top down setting, where the player is rooted in place. This makes the game only about aiming. There-fore, there are multiple "Only One's" with this game:

-Only one bullet

-Only one task

-Only one enemy type

-Only one chance
